Class Server

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class represents a server removing elements from a buffer
Author:
Alex Harlock

    • Server

      public Server​(int id, long elementsToRemove, Buffer buffer)
      A Server tasked with removing elements from a given buffer
      Parameters:
      id - Servers id corresponding to its thread number
      buffer - Buffer to add to
      elementsToRemove - Number of elements to be removed from the buffer
